contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 2008 D Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-championship-first-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Best Cornet Player - Yeovil Town Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £150, 3rdx £100. 7 bands competed. 40th annual contest.
Nov. 12, 2010, 9:13 a.m. July 7, 2020, 1:56 p.m.
1 Poole Borough Band Phil Randell The Year of the Dragon
2 Shirley Band Alwyn Green Tallis Variations
3 Glastonbury Brass Kevin Robbins High Peak
4 South West Comms Band Charles Fleming Fantasy for Brass Band [Arnold]
5 Chalford Band Steve Tubb Prisms
6 Ibstock Brick Brass Ken Ferguson Symphony of Marches
7 Abergavenny Borough Band Gareth Ritter The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
Withdrawn Hyde Band Unknown
Withdrawn Milton Keynes Brass Paul Fensom
Withdrawn Portishead Town Band Nigel Seaman
Withdrawn Swindon Pegasus Brass Stephen Armstrong-Watkins
